title: What Has This Tail?
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 43 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 50L
description: Students will learn about animals and the types of tails they have in What Has This Tail? This nonfiction book provides an opportunity to ask and answer questions about animals. Detailed, supportive photographs, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases provide support for beginning readers.
meta: animal, curly, long, person, short, tail
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast animals in the book
Simple Subject : Recognize and use simple subjects
Question Words : Recognize and use question words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
